name: Trap the Frog
description:
Your mission is to not let the frog escape from the cave. Sounds easy, right? Well, you dealing with a very clever frog. So watch out! Keep your eye on the game, because any mistake can lead to a runaway frog. Match two or more blocks together in order to get rid of the rising blocks. Enjoy!

Feedback: contact@motigames.com
More information: www.motigames.com
